Subjects evaluate symptom previous 24 hour , note severity duration swell 5 location ( abdominal , genitourinary , facial , respiratory [ include laryngeal ] , and/or extremity ) . Twenty-four ( 24 ) subject randomize treat blinded study drug . In total , 25 subject receive least 1 dose study drug analyze safety ; 25 subject expose C1INH-nf 23 subject expose placebo .
